AccessKubernetesApi.name: AccessKubernetesApi
AccessKubernetesApi.description: Grants permission to view Kubernetes objects via AWS EKS console

AssociateAccessPolicy.name: AssociateAccessPolicy
AssociateAccessPolicy.description: Grants permission to associate an Amazon EKS access policy to an Amazon EKS access entry

AssociateEncryptionConfig.name: AssociateEncryptionConfig
AssociateEncryptionConfig.description: Grants permission to associate encryption configuration to a cluster

AssociateIdentityProviderConfig.name: AssociateIdentityProviderConfig
AssociateIdentityProviderConfig.description: Grants permission to associate an identity provider configuration to a cluster

CreateAccessEntry.name: CreateAccessEntry
CreateAccessEntry.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon EKS access entry

CreateAddon.name: CreateAddon
CreateAddon.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon EKS add-on

CreateCluster.name: CreateCluster
CreateCluster.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon EKS cluster

CreateEksAnywhereSubscription.name: CreateEksAnywhereSubscription
CreateEksAnywhereSubscription.description: Grants permission to create an EKS Anywhere subscription

CreateFargateProfile.name: CreateFargateProfile
CreateFargateProfile.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Fargate profile

CreateNodegroup.name: CreateNodegroup
CreateNodegroup.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon EKS Nodegroup

CreatePodIdentityAssociation.name: CreatePodIdentityAssociation
CreatePodIdentityAssociation.description: Grants permission to create an EKS Pod Identity association

DeleteAccessEntry.name: DeleteAccessEntry
DeleteAccessEntry.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon EKS access entry

DeleteAddon.name: DeleteAddon
DeleteAddon.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon EKS add-on

DeleteCluster.name: DeleteCluster
DeleteCluster.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon EKS cluster

DeleteEksAnywhereSubscription.name: DeleteEksAnywhereSubscription
DeleteEksAnywhereSubscription.description: Grants permission to describe an EKS Anywhere subscription

DeleteFargateProfile.name: DeleteFargateProfile
DeleteFargateProfile.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Fargate profile

DeleteNodegroup.name: DeleteNodegroup
DeleteNodegroup.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon EKS Nodegroup

DeletePodIdentityAssociation.name: DeletePodIdentityAssociation
DeletePodIdentityAssociation.description: Grants permission to delete an EKS Pod Identity association

DeregisterCluster.name: DeregisterCluster
DeregisterCluster.description: Grants permission to deregister an External cluster

DescribeAccessEntry.name: DescribeAccessEntry
DescribeAccessEntry.description: Grants permission to describe an Amazon EKS access entry

DescribeAddon.name: DescribeAddon
DescribeAddon.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptive information about an Amazon EKS add-on

DescribeAddonConfiguration.name: DescribeAddonConfiguration
DescribeAddonConfiguration.description: Grants permission to list configuration options about an Amazon EKS add-on

DescribeAddonVersions.name: DescribeAddonVersions
DescribeAddonVersions.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptive version information about the add-ons that Amazon EKS Add-ons supports

DescribeCluster.name: DescribeCluster
DescribeCluster.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptive information about an Amazon EKS cluster

DescribeEksAnywhereSubscription.name: DescribeEksAnywhereSubscription
DescribeEksAnywhereSubscription.description: Grants permission to describe an EKS Anywhere subscription

DescribeFargateProfile.name: DescribeFargateProfile
DescribeFargateProfile.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptive information about an AWS Fargate profile associated with a cluster

DescribeIdentityProviderConfig.name: DescribeIdentityProviderConfig
DescribeIdentityProviderConfig.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptive information about an Idp config associated with a cluster

DescribeInsight.name: DescribeInsight
DescribeInsight.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptive information of a detected insight for a specified cluster

DescribeNodegroup.name: DescribeNodegroup
DescribeNodegroup.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptive information about an Amazon EKS nodegroup

DescribePodIdentityAssociation.name: DescribePodIdentityAssociation
DescribePodIdentityAssociation.description: Grants permission to describe an EKS Pod Identity association

DescribeUpdate.name: DescribeUpdate
DescribeUpdate.description: Grants permission to retrieve a given update for a given Amazon EKS cluster/nodegroup/add-on (in the specified or default region)

DisassociateAccessPolicy.name: DisassociateAccessPolicy
DisassociateAccessPolicy.description: Grants permission to disassociate an Amazon EKS access policy from an Amazon EKS acces entry

DisassociateIdentityProviderConfig.name: DisassociateIdentityProviderConfig
DisassociateIdentityProviderConfig.description: Grants permission to delete an asssociated Idp config

ListAccessEntries.name: ListAccessEntries
ListAccessEntries.description: Grants permission to list all Amazon EKS access entries

ListAccessPolicies.name: ListAccessPolicies
ListAccessPolicies.description: Grants permission to list Amazon EKS access policies

ListAddons.name: ListAddons
ListAddons.description: Grants permission to list the Amazon EKS add-ons in your AWS account (in the specified or default region) for a given cluster

ListAssociatedAccessPolicies.name: ListAssociatedAccessPolicies
ListAssociatedAccessPolicies.description: Grants permission to list associated access policy on and Amazon EKS access entry

ListClusters.name: ListClusters
ListClusters.description: Grants permission to list the Amazon EKS clusters in your AWS account (in the specified or default region)

ListEksAnywhereSubscriptions.name: ListEksAnywhereSubscriptions
ListEksAnywhereSubscriptions.description: Grants permission to list EKS Anywhere subscriptions

ListFargateProfiles.name: ListFargateProfiles
ListFargateProfiles.description: Grants permission to list the AWS Fargate profiles in your AWS account (in the specified or default region) associated with a given cluster

ListIdentityProviderConfigs.name: ListIdentityProviderConfigs
ListIdentityProviderConfigs.description: Grants permission to list the Idp configs in your AWS account (in the specified or default region) associated with a given cluster

ListInsights.name: ListInsights
ListInsights.description: Grants permission to list all detected insights for a specified cluster

ListNodegroups.name: ListNodegroups
ListNodegroups.description: Grants permission to list the Amazon EKS nodegroups in your AWS account (in the specified or default region) attached to given cluster

ListPodIdentityAssociations.name: ListPodIdentityAssociations
ListPodIdentityAssociations.description: Grants permission to list EKS Pod Identity associations

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for the specified resource

ListUpdates.name: ListUpdates
ListUpdates.description: Grants permission to list the updates for a given Amazon EKS cluster/nodegroup/add-on (in the specified or default region)

RegisterCluster.name: RegisterCluster
RegisterCluster.description: Grants permission to register an External cluster

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag the specified resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag the specified resource

UpdateAccessEntry.name: UpdateAccessEntry
UpdateAccessEntry.description: Grants permission to update an Amazon EKS access entry

UpdateAddon.name: UpdateAddon
UpdateAddon.description: Grants permission to update Amazon EKS add-on configurations, such as the VPC-CNI version

UpdateClusterConfig.name: UpdateClusterConfig
UpdateClusterConfig.description: Grants permission to update Amazon EKS cluster configurations (eg: API server endpoint access)

UpdateClusterVersion.name: UpdateClusterVersion
UpdateClusterVersion.description: Grants permission to update the Kubernetes version of an Amazon EKS cluster

UpdateEksAnywhereSubscription.name: UpdateEksAnywhereSubscription
UpdateEksAnywhereSubscription.description: Grants permission to update an EKS Anywhere subscription

UpdateNodegroupConfig.name: UpdateNodegroupConfig
UpdateNodegroupConfig.description: Grants permission to update Amazon EKS nodegroup configurations (eg: min/max/desired capacity or labels)

UpdateNodegroupVersion.name: UpdateNodegroupVersion
UpdateNodegroupVersion.description: Grants permission to update the Kubernetes version of an Amazon EKS nodegroup

UpdatePodIdentityAssociation.name: UpdatePodIdentityAssociation
UpdatePodIdentityAssociation.description: Grants permission to update an EKS Pod Identity association
